Tuxera invoicing information

Please see invoicing instructions below by each Tuxera company:

Tuxera Oy

Tuxera Oy

Business ID: 2215511-8

VAT number: FI22155118

E-invoicing address: 003722155118

E-invoicing operator: Maventa

Operator’s ID: 003721291126

Mediator code if sending from bank networks: DABAFIHH

Invoices in pdf format may be sent to . When sending your invoice as pdf attachment, please note:

Each invoice and all related attachments need to be combined into one file

Multiple different invoice files can be sent in one email, but each file needs to be named differently, and must be made according to the previous bullet point

The file name is not allowed to contain other characters than a-z, A-Z, 0-9 (however, spaces, hyphens and underlines are allowed)

Total size of the email cannot exceed 10 Mb

The pdf files need to be authentic pdf documents (version 1.3 or higher)

Files must not be protected with a password or locked in any way

The size of the document may not be greater than 210 x 297 mm (A4 ISO standard)

Should you have any questions, please contact .
